author: sroychow
body:
#### PR description:
Part of #31061. Migrate plugins of  ```CondTools/DT/```  to use esConsumes. Apart from that, cout statements were removed. Standalone analyzers inside the test directory have been migrated to use esConsumes as well.
#### PR validation:
Code compiles and scram checks don't show the ```EventSetupRecord::get``` warning.

#Backport
NA
title: Migrate Condtools-DT modules to esConsumes
